summary:
The Council:

1. Welcomes progress in negotiations towards a comprehensive settlement.
2. Calls on leaders to intensify negotiations, improve public atmosphere, and increase civil society participation.
3. Urges implementation of confidence-building measures, including opening of crossing points.
4. Reaffirms relevant resolutions on Cyprus.
5. Extends UNFICYP's mandate until 15 June 2011.
6. Calls on both sides to consult with UNFICYP on buffer zone demarcation and 1989 aide-memoire.
7. Calls on Turkish Cypriot side and Turkish forces to restore military status quo in Strovilia.
8. Requests Secretary-General to report on implementation by 1 June 2011.
9. Welcomes efforts to implement zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.
10. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
